constraint.SQL: ["TPIF_CPWDFL.Type=2 AND\r\nTPIF_CPWDFL.ID NOT IN (SELECT WDFL FROM PIF.TPIF_CPWDMX WHERE WDMB ={0})",[{"expression":"WDMB.ID","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

["TPIF_SHWDGS.ID IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT SHWDGS FROM PIF.TPIF_CPWDFL WHERE ID={0}), '([^;]+)', 1, ROWNUM)\r\n FROM DUAL\r\n CONNECT BY ROWNUM < (LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE((SELECT SHWDGS FROM PIF.TPIF_CPWDFL WHERE ID={0}), '[^;]', '')) + 2))",[{"expression":"WDFL","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

["TPIF_SHWDGS.ID IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT SHWDGS FROM PIF.TPIF_CPWDFL WHERE ID={0}), '([^;]+)', 1, ROWNUM)\r\n FROM DUAL\r\n CONNECT BY ROWNUM < (LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE((SELECT SHWDGS FROM PIF.TPIF_CPWDFL WHERE ID={0}), '[^;]', '')) + 2))",[{"expression":"WDFL","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

["TPIF_SHWDGS.ID IN (SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR((SELECT SHWDGS FROM PIF.TPIF_CPWDFL WHERE ID={0}), '([^;]+)', 1, ROWNUM)\r\n FROM DUAL\r\n CONNECT BY ROWNUM < (LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE((SELECT SHWDGS FROM PIF.TPIF_CPWDFL WHERE ID={0}), '[^;]', '')) + 2))",[{"expression":"WDFL","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}]]

validator.name: expression
validator.message: 排序字段的值必须大于0
